name: deviceManagement_monitoring_UpdateAlertRules
description: Update the navigation property alertRules in deviceManagement

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.

**alertRuleTemplate**: The rule template of the alert event. The possible values are: cloudPcProvisionScenario, cloudPcImageUploadScenario, cloudPcOnPremiseNetworkConnectionCheckScenario, unknownFutureValue.
**displayName**: The display name of the rule.
**enabled**: The status of the rule that indicates whether the rule is enabled or disabled. If true, the rule is enabled; otherwise, the rule is disabled.

**isSystemRule**: Indicates whether the rule is a system rule. If true, the rule is a system rule; otherwise, the rule is a custom defined rule and can be edited. System rules are built-in and only a few properties can be edited.
**notificationChannels**: The notification channels of the rule selected by the user.
**severity**: The severity of the rule. The possible values are: unknown, informational, warning, critical, unknownFutureValue.
**threshold**: The conditions to send alerts. For example, send alert when provisioning has failed for greater than or equal to 6 Cloud PCs.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
